app.application_description: Monica is a tool to manage your interactions with your loved ones, friends and family.
app.application_og_title: Have better relations with your loved ones. Free Online CRM for friends and family.
app.compliance_desc: We have changed our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. By law we have to ask you to review them and accept them so you can continue to use your account.
app.compliance_desc_end: We don’t do anything nasty with your data or account and will never do.
app.compliance_terms: Accept new terms and privacy policy
app.error_save: We had an error trying to save the data.
app.error_unauthorized: You don’t have the right to edit this resource.
app.footer_modal_version_release_away: Jste jedno vydání pozadu za nejnovější dostupnou verzí. Měli byste aktualizovat svou instanci.|Jste :number vydání pozadu za nejnovější dostupnou verzí. Měli byste aktualizovat svou instanci.
app.markdown_description: Chcete pohodlně formátovat text? Podporujeme formát markdown pro značení tučně, kurzivou, vytváření seznamu a další.

auth.2fa_otp_help: Open up your two factor authentication mobile app and copy the code
auth.2fa_recuperation_code: Enter a two factor recovery code
auth.2fa_wrong_validation: The two factor authentication has failed.
auth.confirmation_again: If you want to change your email address you can click here.
auth.create_account: Create the first account by signing up
auth.email_changed: Your email address has been changed. Check your mailbox to validate it.
auth.failed: Tyto přihlašovací údaje neodpovídají uloženým záznamům.
auth.login_again: Please login again to your account
auth.mfa_auth_otp: Authenticate with your two factor device
auth.password_reset_email_content: Click here to reset your password:
auth.register_create_account: You need to create an account to use Monica
auth.register_invitation_email: For security purposes, please indicate the email of the person who’ve invited you to join this account. This information is provided in the invitation email.
auth.register_login: Log in if you already have an account.
auth.register_policy: Signing up signifies you’ve read and agree to our Privacy Policy and Terms of use.
auth.register_title_welcome: Welcome to your newly installed Monica instance
auth.throttle: Příliš mnoho pokusů o přihlášení. Opakujte pokus za :seconds sekund.
auth.u2f_otp_extension: U2F is supported natively on Chrome, Firefox and Opera. On old Firefox versions, install the U2F Support Add-on.

changelog.note: Note: unfortunately, this page is only in English.
changelog.title: Product changes

dashboard.dashboard_blank_description: Monica is the place to organize all the interactions you have with the ones you care about.
dashboard.notes_title: You don’t have any starred notes yet.
dashboard.tab_calls_blank: You haven’t logged a call yet.
dashboard.tab_debts_blank: You haven’t logged any debt yet.

journal.delete_confirmation: Opravdu chcete smazat tento deníkový záznam?
journal.journal_blank_description: Deník umožňuje zaznamenávání událostí které se staly a ulehčuje jejich zapamatování.
journal.journal_come_back: Thanks. Come back tomorrow to rate your day again.
journal.journal_description: Note: the journal lists both manual journal entries, and automatic entries like Activities done with your contacts. While you can delete journal entries manually, you’ll have to delete the activity directly on the contact page.
journal.journal_rate: How was your day? You can rate it once a day.

mail.confirmation_email_intro: To validate your email click on the button below
mail.footer_contact_info: Přidat, zobrazit, dodat a změnit informace k této osobě:
mail.notification_description: In :count days (on :date), the following event will happen:
mail.notifications_footer: If you’re having trouble clicking the ":actionText" button, copy and paste the URL below into your web browser: [:actionURL](:actionURL)
mail.stay_in_touch_subject_description: You asked to be reminded to stay in touch with :name every :frequency days.

passwords.invalid: Current password you entered is not correct.
passwords.password: Hesla musí obsahovat alespoň šest znaků a oba zápisy se musí shodovat.
passwords.sent: Pokud byl zadaný email nalezen mezi uživateli, byl na něj odeslán odkaz na reset hesla.
passwords.token: Toto není platný odkaz na reset hesla.
passwords.user: Pokud byl zadaný email nalezen mezi uživateli, byl na něj odeslán odkaz na reset hesla.

people.activities_add_pick_activity: (Optional) Would you like to categorize this activity? You don’t have to, but it will give you statistics later on
people.activities_blank_title: Keep track of what you’ve done with :name in the past, and what you’ve talked about
people.activities_profile_subtitle: You’ve logged :total_activities activity with :name in total and :activities_last_twelve_months in the last 12 months so far.|You’ve logged :total_activities activities with :name in total and :activities_last_twelve_months in the last 12 months so far.
people.activities_profile_year_summary: Here is what you two have done in :year
people.activities_profile_year_summary_activity: Here is a breakdown of the type of activities you’ve done together in :year

people.deceased_add_reminder: Add a reminder for this date
people.deceased_know_date: I know the date this person died
people.food_preferencies_edit_description: Možná má :firstname nebo někdo z rodiny :family alergii. Nebo nemusí nějaké specifické víno. Poznačte si to zde, abyste si vzpoměli před příštím pozváním na večeři
people.food_preferencies_edit_description_no_la: Možná má :firstname alergii. Nebo nemusí nějaké specifické víno. Poznačte si to zde, abyste si vzpoměli před příštím pozváním na večeři
people.gifts_add_someone: This gift is for someone in :name’s family in particular
people.gifts_update_success: The gift has been updated successfully
people.information_edit_exact: Vím přesné datum narození této osoby, které je
people.information_edit_not_year: I know the day and month of the birthdate of this person, but not the year…
people.introductions_add_reminder: Add a reminder to celebrate this encounter on the anniversary this event happened
people.introductions_additional_info: Explain how and where you met
people.introductions_edit_met_through: Has someone introduced you to this person?
people.introductions_first_met_date_known: This is the date we met
people.introductions_no_first_met_date: I don’t know the date we met
people.introductions_reminder_title: Anniversary of the day you first met
people.introductions_update_success: You’ve successfully updated the information about how you met this person
people.notes_delete_confirmation: Opravdu chcete smazat tuto poznámku? Smazání je trvalé.
people.people_add_missing: No Person Found Add New One Now
people.people_add_reminder_for_birthday: Create an annual reminder for the birthday
people.people_delete_confirmation: Opravdu chcete smazat tento kontakt? Smazání je trvalé.
people.people_edit_email_error: There is already a contact in your account with this email address. Please choose another one.
people.people_list_account_upgrade_title: Upgrade your account to unlock it to its full potential.
people.people_list_blank_title: Zatím jste do svého účtu nikoho nepřidali
people.people_list_filter_tag: Showing all the contacts tagged with
people.people_list_lastactivitydateNewtoOld: Sort by last activity date newest to oldest
people.people_list_lastactivitydateOldtoNew: Sort by last activity date oldest to newest
people.pets_create_success: The pet has been sucessfully added
people.relationship_delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this relationship? Deletion is permanent.
people.relationship_form_add_description: This will let you treat this significant other like any other contact.
people.relationship_form_add_no_existing_contac: You don’t have any contacts who can be related to :name at the moment.
people.relationship_form_add_success: The relationship has been successfully set.
people.relationship_form_also_create_contact: Create a Contact entry for this person.
people.relationship_form_associate_dropdown: Search and select an existing contact from the dropdown below
people.relationship_form_associate_dropdown_pla: Search and select an existing contact
people.relationship_unlink_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this relationship? This person will not be deleted – only the relationship between the two.
people.reminders_add_next_time: Kdy budete chtít být na tuto skutečnost příště upozorněni?
people.reminders_add_title: Na co chcete být upozorňováni pro osobu :name?
people.reminders_blank_title: Je něco na co chcete být upozorňováni pro osobu :name?
people.reminders_description: Pro každé upozornění níže bude poslán email. Upozornění jsou rozesílána ráno v den události. Automatická upozornění pro zadaná data narození nelze smazat. Pokud chcete změnit tato data, upravte datum narození kontaktů.
people.reminders_free_plan_warning: You are on the Free plan. No emails are sent on this plan. To receive your reminders by email, upgrade your account.
people.reminders_update_success: The reminder has been updated successfully
people.set_favorite: Favorite contacts are placed at the top of the contact list
people.stay_in_touch_frequency: Stay in touch every day|Stay in touch every {count} days
people.stay_in_touch_invalid: The frequency must be a number greater than 0.
people.stay_in_touch_modal_desc: We can remind you by email to keep in touch with {firstname} at a regular interval.
people.stay_in_touch_premium: You need to upgrade your account to make use of this feature
people.tasks_blank_title: You don’t have any tasks yet.

settings.2fa_disable_description: Disable Two Factor Authentication for your account. Be careful, your account will not be secured anymore !
settings.2fa_disable_error: Error when trying to disable Two Factor Authentication
settings.2fa_enable_description: Enable Two Factor Authentication to increase security with your account.
settings.2fa_enable_error: Error when trying to activate Two Factor Authentication
settings.2fa_enable_error_already_set: Two Factor Authentication is already activated
settings.2fa_enable_otp: Open up your two factor authentication mobile app and scan the following QR barcode:
settings.2fa_enable_otp_help: If your two factor authentication mobile app does not support QR barcodes, enter in the following code:
settings.2fa_enable_otp_validate: Please validate the new device you’ve just set:
settings.api_authorized_clients_desc: This section lists all the clients you’ve authorized to access your application. You can revoke this authorization at anytime.
settings.api_description: The API can be used to manipulate Monica’s data from an external application, like a mobile application for instance.
settings.api_oauth_clients_desc: This section lets you register your own OAuth clients.
settings.api_oauth_name_help: Something your users will recognize and trust.
settings.api_oauth_not_created: You have not created any OAuth clients.
settings.api_pao_description: Make sure you give this token to a source you trust – as they allow you to access all your data.
settings.api_token_help: Here is your new personal access token. This is the only time it will be shown so don’t lose it! You may now use this token to make API requests.
settings.api_token_not_created: You have not created any personal access tokens.
settings.delete_desc: Opravdu chcete smazat tento účet? Varování: smazání účtu je trvalé a všechna data účtu budou trvale vymazána.
settings.delete_notice: Opravdu chcete smazat svůj účet? Poté nebude cesty zpět.
settings.email_help: This is the email used to login, and this is where you’ll receive your reminders.
settings.export_be_patient: Kliknout na tlačítko pro spuštění exportu. Zpracování exportu může zabrat až několik minut – buďte prosím trpěliví a neklikejte vícekrát.
settings.export_sql_explanation: Export dat v SQL formátu je umožňuje převést a importovat do vlastní instance Monica. Toto se hodí hlavně pokud provozujete vlastní server.
settings.export_sql_link_instructions: Poznámka: přečtěte si instrukce abyste se dozvěděli více o importu tohoto souboru do vlastní instance.
settings.import_blank_description: Umíme importovat soubory vCard, které můžete získat z Google Contacts nebo svého správce kontaktů.
settings.import_blank_title: You haven’t imported any contacts yet.
settings.import_in_progress: Probíhá import. Obnovit stránku za jednu minutu.
settings.import_result_stat: Uploaded vCard with 1 contact (:total_imported imported, :total_skipped skipped)|Uploaded vCard with :total_contacts contacts (:total_imported imported, :total_skipped skipped)
settings.import_upload_behaviour_help: Note: Replacing will replace all data found in the vCard, but will keep existing contact fields.
settings.import_upload_rule_cant_revert: Make sure data is accurate before uploading, as you can’t undo the upload.
settings.import_upload_rule_instructions: Instrukce pro export z Contacts.app (macOS) a Google Contacts.
settings.import_upload_rule_multiple: Pokud mají vaše kontakty vícero emailů nebo telefonních čísel, bude importován pouze první z těchto záznamů.
settings.import_upload_rule_time: Nahrání a zpracování kontaktů může zabrat až 1 minutu. Buďte trpěliví.
settings.import_upload_rule_vcard: Podporujeme formát vCard 3.0, který je výchozím formátem aplikací Contacts.app (macOS) a Google Contacts.
settings.name: Vlastní jméno: :name
settings.personalisation_paid_upgrade: This is a premium feature that requires a Paid subscription to be active. Upgrade your account by visiting Settings > Subscription.
settings.personalization_activity_type_category_a: Add a new activity type category
settings.personalization_activity_type_category_d: An activity done with one of your contact can have a type and a category type. Your account comes by default with a set of predefined category types, but you can customize everything here.
settings.personalization_activity_type_category_m: Add a new activity type category
Are you sure you want to delete this category? Deleting it will delete all associated activity types. However, activities that belong to this category will not be affected by this deletion.
We can’t find this activity type category.
How should we name this new category?
settings.personalization_activity_type_modal_dele: Are you sure you want to delete this activity type? Activities that belong to this category will not be affected by this deletion.
We can’t find this activity type.
settings.personalization_activity_type_modal_ques: How should we name this new activity type?
settings.personalization_contact_field_type_add_s: The contact field type has been successfully added.
settings.personalization_contact_field_type_delet: The contact field type has been deleted with success.
settings.personalization_contact_field_type_descr: Here you can configure all the different types of contact fields that you can associate to all your contacts. If in the future, a new social network appears, you will be able to add this new type of ways of contacting your contacts right here.
settings.personalization_contact_field_type_edit_: The contact field type has been successfully updated.
settings.personalization_contact_field_type_modal: Are you sure you want to delete this contact field type? Deleting this type of contact field will delete ALL the data with this type for all your contacts.
Delete an existing contact field type
Edit an existing contact field type
You can associate an icon with this contact field type. You need to add a reference to a Font Awesome icon.
Each new contact field type can be clickable. If a protocol is set, we will use it to trigger the action that is set.
Add a new contact field type
settings.personalization_genders_desc: You can define as many genders as you need to. You need at least one gender type in your account.
settings.personalization_genders_modal_delete_des: Are you sure you want to delete {name}?
settings.personalization_genders_modal_delete_que: You currently have {count} contact that has this gender. If you delete this gender, what gender should this contact have?|You currently have {count} contacts that have this gender. If you delete this gender, what gender should these contacts have?
settings.personalization_genders_modal_edit_quest: How should this new gender be renamed?
settings.personalization_genders_modal_error: Please choose a valid gender from the list.
settings.personalization_genders_modal_question: How should this new gender be called?
settings.personalization_module_desc: Some people don’t need all the features. Below you can toggle specific features that are used on a contact sheet. This change will affect ALL your contacts. Note that if you turn off one of these features, data will not be lost - we will simply hide the feature.
settings.personalization_reminder_rule_desc: For every reminder that you set, we can send you an email some days before the event happens. You can toggle those notifications here. Note that those notifications only apply to monthly and yearly reminders.
settings.personalization_title: Here you can find different settings to configure your account. These features are more for “power users” who want maximum control over Monica.
settings.reminder_time_to_send: Time of the day reminders should be sent
settings.reminder_time_to_send_help: For your information, your next reminder will be sent on {dateTime}.
settings.reset_desc: Opravdu chcete resetovat svůj účet? Toto odstraní všechny kontakty a jejich související data. Účet nebude smazán.
settings.reset_notice: Opravdu chcete resetovat svůj účet? Poté nebude cesty zpět.
settings.security_help: Change security matters for your account.
settings.subscriptions_account_current_paid_plan: You are on the :name plan. Thanks so much for being a subscriber.
settings.subscriptions_account_free_plan_benefits: Dlouhodobá podpora projektu, která umožní zavedení dalších skvělých funkcí.
settings.subscriptions_account_free_plan_upgrade: Svůj účet můžete povýšit na verzi :name, která měsíčně stojí $:price. Zde jsou výhody:
settings.subscriptions_account_next_billing: K automatickému obnovení dojde :date. Odběr můžete zrušit kdykoliv.
settings.subscriptions_account_payment: Which payment option fits you best?
settings.subscriptions_account_upgrade_choice: Pick a plan below and join over :customers persons who upgraded their Monica.
settings.subscriptions_account_upgrade_title: Upgrade Monica today and have more meaningful relationships.
settings.subscriptions_downgrade_limitations: Bezplatná verze má omezení. K přechodu na bezplatnou verzi musíte projít seznam níže:
settings.subscriptions_downgrade_rule_invitations: You currently have 1 pending invitation sent to people.|You currently have :count pending invitations sent to people.
settings.subscriptions_downgrade_rule_users: Smíte mít pouze jednoho uživatele účtu
settings.subscriptions_downgrade_rule_users_const: You currently have 1 user in your account.|You currently have :count users in your account.
settings.subscriptions_downgrade_success: You are back to the Free plan!
settings.subscriptions_downgrade_thanks: Thanks so much for having tried the paid plan. We keep adding new features on Monica all the time – so you might want to come back in the future to see if you might be interested in taking a subscription again.
settings.subscriptions_help_change_desc: You can cancel anytime, no questions asked, and all by yourself – no need to contact support or whatever. However, you will not be refunded for the current period.
settings.subscriptions_help_change_title: What if I change my mind?
settings.subscriptions_help_discounts_desc: We do! Monica is free for students, and free for non-profits and charities. Just contact the support with a proof of your status and we’ll apply this special status in your account.
settings.subscriptions_help_discounts_title: Do you have discounts for non-profits and education?
settings.subscriptions_help_limits_plan: Yes. Free plans let you manage :number contacts.
settings.subscriptions_help_limits_title: Is there any limit to the number of contacts we can have on the free plan?
settings.subscriptions_help_opensource_desc: Monica is an open source project. This means it is built by an entirely benevolent community who just wants to provide a great tool for the greater good. Being open source means the code is publicly available on GitHub, and everyone can inspect it, modify it or enhance it. All the money we raise is dedicated to build better features, have more powerful servers, help pay the bills. Thanks for your help. We couldn’t do it without you – litterally.
settings.subscriptions_help_opensource_title: What is an open source project?
settings.subscriptions_help_title: Additional details you may be curious about
settings.subscriptions_plan_include2: Unlimited number of users • Reminders by email • Import with vCard • Personalization of the contact sheet
settings.subscriptions_plan_include3: 100% of the profits go the development of this great open source project.
settings.subscriptions_plan_year_bonus: Peace of mind for a whole year
settings.subscriptions_upgrade_charge: We’ll charge your card USD $:price now. The next charge will be on :date. If you ever change your mind, you can cancel anytime, no questions asked.
settings.subscriptions_upgrade_charge_handled: The payment is handled by Stripe. No card information touches our server.
settings.subscriptions_upgrade_infos: We couldn’t be happier. Enter your payment info below.
settings.subscriptions_upgrade_success: Thank you! You are now subscribed.
settings.subscriptions_upgrade_thanks: Welcome to the community of people who try to make the world a better place.
settings.tags_blank_description: Tagy fungují jako adresáře, kontaktům můžete ale přidat vícero tagů. Přejděte na kontakt a otagujte přítele hned pod jeho jménem. Jakmile je kontakt otagován, vraťte se zpět pro správu všech tagů v tomto účtu.
settings.tags_blank_title: Tagy jsou šikovné řešení kategorizace kontaktů.
settings.tags_list_delete_confirmation: Opravdu chcete smazat tento tag? Bude smazán pouze vybraný tag, žádné kontakty.
settings.tags_list_description: Své kontakty můžete organizovat pomocí tagů. Tagy fungují jako adresáře, kontaktům můžete ale přidat vícero tagů. Nový tag přidáte úpravou vlastního kontaktu.
settings.u2f_buttonAdvise: If your security key has a button, press it.
settings.u2f_enable_description: Add a new U2F security key
settings.u2f_error_bad_request: The visited URL doesn’t match the App ID or your are not using HTTPS
settings.u2f_error_device_ineligible: The presented device is not eligible for this request. For a registration request this may mean that the token is already registered, and for a sign request it may mean that the token does not know the presented key handle.
settings.u2f_error_timeout: Timeout reached before request could be satisfied.
settings.u2f_noButtonAdvise: If it does not, remove it and insert it again.
settings.u2f_success: Your key is detected and validated.
settings.users_accept_title: Accept invitation and create a new account
settings.users_add_confirmation: Potvrzuji, že chci pozvat tohoto uživatele do svého účtu. Tato osoba bude moci přistupovat ke VŠEM mým datům a uvidí přesně to co já.
settings.users_add_description: Tato osoba bude mít stejná oprávnění včetně možnosti zvát a mazat další uživatele (včetně vás). Proto si raději buďte jisti, že jí můžete věřit.
settings.users_add_email_field: Zadejte email osoby, kterou chcete pozvat
settings.users_add_title: Pozvat emailem nového uživatele k tomuto účtu
settings.users_blank_description: Tato osoba bude mít stejný přístup a bude schopna přidávat, upravovat a mazat informace kontaktů.
settings.users_blank_title: Jste zatím samotným uživatelem s přístupem k tomuto účtu.
settings.users_error_already_invited: Již jste tohoto uživatele pozvali. Vyberte prosím jinou emailovou adresu.
settings.users_error_email_already_taken: Email byl již použit. Vyberte prosím nějaký jiný
settings.users_error_email_not_similar: This is not the email of the person who’ve invited you.
settings.users_error_please_confirm: Potvrďte prosím, že chcete přizvat ?tuto osobu?, než bude pozvánka zpracována
settings.users_invitation_need_subscription: Adding more users requires a subscription.
settings.users_list_delete_confirmation: Opravdu chcete smazat tohoto uživatele z tohoto účtu?
settings.users_list_invitations_explanation: Below are the people you’ve invited to join Monica as a collaborator.
settings.users_list_title: Uživatelé s přístupem k tomuto účtu

validation.after_or_equal: The :attribute must be a date after or equal to :date.
validation.alpha_dash: :attribute smí obsahovat pouze písmena, číslice a pomlčky.
validation.alpha_num: :attribute smí obsahovat pouze písmena a číslice.
validation.before_or_equal: The :attribute must be a date before or equal to :date.

between.file: :attribute musí být v rozmezí :min a :max kilobajtů.
between.string: :attribute musí být v rozmezí :min a :max znaků.

validation.boolean: Pole :attribute musí být true nebo false.
validation.digits_between: :attribute musí být v rozmezí :min a :max číslic.
validation.filled: The :attribute field must have a value.
validation.ipv4: The :attribute must be a valid IPv4 address.
validation.ipv6: The :attribute must be a valid IPv6 address.
validation.mimetypes: The :attribute must be a file of type: :values.
validation.required_if: Pole :attribute je vyžadováno, když :other má hodnotu :value.
validation.required_unless: Pole :attribute je vyžadováno, pokud :other je v :values.
validation.required_with: Pole :attribute je vyžadováno, pokud :values je dárek.
validation.required_with_all: Pole :attribute je vyžadováno, pokud :values je dárek.
validation.required_without: Pole :attribute je vyžadováno, pokud :values není dárek.
validation.required_without_all: Pole :attribute je vyžadováno, pokud není žádná z :values dárek.
